pinyin: Huo4 er3 mu4 zi1 Hai3 xia2

definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: To the Strait of Hormuz and the Gulf of Oman and the Arabian Sea converge.
sentences.chinese: 以霍爾木茲海峽和阿曼灣與阿拉伯海銜接。

sentences.english: President Ahmadinejad threatens to close Strait of Hormuz.
sentences.chinese: 內賈德總統威脅關閉霍爾木茲海峽。
